author: yuga.eth
content:
Hi! Does anybody know whether there are further requirements, specs, or existing implementations of assemble_block as in here? 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/0eb0a934a38ecc2bc77c08a9919d71b966fedf38/specs/merge/validator.md#executionengine

author: djrtwo
content:
`assemble_block` is 
1. being modified to match latest specs here -- https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2613
2. in practice will be the consensus calling the engine api for a valuable payload (preparePaylod and getPayload) -- https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/74

author: djrtwo
content: it is essentially a call to the local execution engine to provide a valuable and correct execution-layer payload -- transactions, result of EVM state transition, etc
